name: Cocktail Meatballs III
author: Lynn LaBuy
summary: Cocktail Meatballs in a tangy sauce - easy and DELICIOUS! Serve with your favorite crackers.
ingredients: 2 (1 ounce) packages dry onion soup mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Remove the crusts from the white bread and tear into small bread crumbs
In a medium size mixing bowl, combine beef, soup mix, white bread crumbs and half-and-half cream
Roll mixture into 1 inch balls and arrange in 9x13 inch baking dishes (as many baking dishes as it takes or bake the meatballs in shifts)
Bake 10 to 15 minutes; or until browned
In a slow cooker with the temperature set to high, mix together ketchup, brown sugar and Worcestershire sauce
Cook until the mixture comes to a boil, then reduce temperature to low until you are ready to serve the meatballs
Place the meatballs in the sauce and serve
